where INA01 = #{ina01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete ${centre}.ina_file where ina02 <=sysdate AND inaconf !='X' and ina01 not in (select distinct inb01 from ${centre}.inb_file)
mapper.select:
select ina00,ina01,ina02,ina03,ina04,ina06,inaconf,inapost,inaplant as centre from ${centre}.ina_file
and ina01 like '%${code_1}%'
order by ina03,ina01
